newsitem.title: UK: HK stocks in London lower ahead of future expiry.
newsitem.headline: HK stocks in London lower ahead of future expiry.

text.p: Hong Kong stocks in London on Wednesday were steady to lower as investors stayed on the sidelines in advance of the May Hang Seng Index futures contract expiry on Thursday, dealers said.
"No one wants to jump in ahead of tomorrow's futures expiry," said one dealer.
The Hang Seng London Reference Index nudged 6.74 points lower to close at 14,549.74 in subdued trade after the Hang Seng rose 16.32 points to 14,556.48 in Hong Kong.
Heavyweight banking group HSBC Holdings fell 12-1/2 cents to HK$228.87-1/2 in an otherwise featureless session.
"Looks like the banks are having a rest after a good day yesterday," said one dealer.
